channel.title: [PI] Duel arena help
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/afZaeIc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pmn3mt1.png[/img]
[b]I need it automaticlly to off it![/b]
[b]But if i off it in side the duel and try to wear it again, it works see:[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lbf4vAS.png[/img]
[b]But it must automatic off it. How to fix?[/b]

item.title: [PI] Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That’s not going to teach you much…
Open the class that handles your duel area.
Where it checks what options are disabled, add 2 handed weapons to the shield check

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @Rye Rye
item.description:
@Rye wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:522428”][quote author=Rye link=topic=640933.msg4318412#msg4318412 date=1371857134]

Make it check the settings, and if you’re wielding a 2 handed weapon have it remove it if shields are disabled?
[/quote]I was wearing Gs, i challenged my friend and clicked “no kite” as u see in the image, we goes on, and i still wearing the gs… It must off it, how to fix ?

But if i Un wear the gs and wear it back i can’t.

I just told you what you need to do…[/quote]i told you already, I’m new, ok look, i need to help me like this:

Open client.java

Search for: “x,y,z”

And under this method add/replace/remove:

[codee]

I understand like this.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Rye, post:3, topic:522428”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640933.msg4318408#msg4318408 date=1371856429]
Make it check the settings, and if you’re wielding a 2 handed weapon have it remove it if shields are disabled?
[/quote]I was wearing Gs, i challenged my friend and clicked “no kite” as u see in the image, we goes on, and i still wearing the gs… It must off it, how to fix ?

But if i Un wear the gs and wear it back i can’t.[/quote]
I just told you what you need to do…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Duel arena help
item.dc:creator: @Rye Rye
item.description:
@Rye wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:522428”]Make it check the settings, and if you’re wielding a 2 handed weapon have it remove it if shields are disabled?[/quote]I was wearing Gs, i challenged my friend and clicked “no kite” as u see in the image, we goes on, and i still wearing the gs… It must off it, how to fix ?

But if i Un wear the gs and wear it back i can’t.

Read full topic
